00026 public:

00028     virtual void DestructItems(int first, int last);    // override
00029

00044     bool FindClosestBuildingCorner(const DPoint2 &point, double error,
00045                            int &building, int &corner, double &distance);
00050     bool FindClosestBuildingCenter(const DPoint2 &point, double error,
00051                            int &building, double &distance);
00052 
00053     bool IsEmpty() { return (GetSize() == 0); }
00054     void GetExtents(DRECT &ext);
00055 
00056     // selection
00057     int NumSelected();
00058     void DeselectAll();
00059 
00060     // override these 'Factory' methods so that the vtStructureArray base
00061     // methods can be capable of handling subclasses of vtBuilding
00062     virtual vtStructure *NewStructure() { return new vtStructure; }
00063     virtual vtBuilding *NewBuilding();
00064     virtual vtFence *NewFence();
